title: Organic aerosol formation from 222 nm germicidal light: ozone-initiated vs. non-ozone pathways
content:

Germicidal ultraviolet lamps outputting 222 nm light (GUV222) have the potential to reduce the airborne spread of disease through effective inactivation of pathogens, while remaining safe for direct human exposure....
